text:
ConsenSys | Fullstack Engineers | Toronto, Canada | Full-Time | ONSITE

ConsenSys is the leading blockchain consultancy globally.

We're hiring several Fullstack engineers in the Toronto area for greenfield projects with major corporate clients.

We'll build systems for clients from the ground up using the Ethereum blockchain and we'll be responsible for all parts of the stack.

Email directly with resume + info about yourself:

simon.xiong@consensys.net
